thread.title: Relativity Media Chairman and CEO Ryan Kavanaugh Issues Sta
thread.title_full: Relativity Media Chairman and CEO Ryan Kavanaugh Issues Sta

author: Relativity Media LLC
title: Relativity Media Chairman and CEO Ryan Kavanaugh Issues Sta
text:
BEVERLY HILLS, Calif. , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The following release is being issued by Relativity Media LLC. " Ryan Kavanaugh in my opinion has been overly helpful in trying to be able to help us create a film industry. We didn't know anything about it. We talked to him, (and) he literally contributed his entire staff to try to help us with bills at the Legislature. None of the results would have given him a direct benefit. It would just allow us to create a film studio," said Maui Mayor Alan Arakawa . 
 

SOURCE Relativity Media LLC
